Battle Icon

  1. What is a 'Battle Icon'? [Source: Community]
    An oblong of colour in the right hand corner of a battle card.
  2. What is a 'blue battle icon'? [Source: Community]
    A blue oblong in the right hand corner of a battle card.
    "The defender gets +1 defense for each blue battle icon you flip when attacking."
  3. What is an 'orange battle icon'? [Source: Community]
    An orange oblong in the right hand corner of a battle card.
    "The attacker gets +1 attack for each orange battle icon you flip when attacking."
  4. What is a 'white battle icon'? [Source: Community]
    An white oblong in the right hand corner of a battle card.
    When attacking or defending, the first white battle icon flipped means the player flips two more battle cards. Additional white icons do not lead to more battle cards being flipped unless an effect explicitly states it does.
